entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
